user_question: What is the company's vacation policy?
system_answer: The company's vacation policy requires all employees to submit vacation requests through the Employee Self-Service Portal at least 2 weeks (14 calendar days) in advance of the requested start date. This advance notice allows managers to plan for coverage and ensures business continuity. To submit a request, employees need to log into the portal, navigate to Time & Attendance, select "Request Time Off", choose "Vacation" as the leave type, enter their start and end dates, and add any comments or notes for their manager.
